entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
